casebody.data:
HOME TELEPHONE COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Lon DARLEY and Rex Darley, Defendants-Appellants. No. 73-1993. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 6, 1974. Rehearing Denied April 16, 1974. Jef Feibelman, H. L. Feibelman, Memphis, Tenn., for defendants-appellants. Robert H. Weaver, J. Kane Ditto, C. Alton Phillips, Jackson, Miss., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before COLEMAN, CLARK and GEE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The judgment appealed from is affirmed on the basis of the memorandum opinion of the District Court, 355 F. Supp. 992 (N.D.Miss., 1973).

Affirmed.
